nameEntry.part: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service

biogHist.abstract: The Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service is part of the Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Services (ATSIS), Australian Capital Territory Government. The Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service aims to provide culturally appropriate placement options for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander children and young people who are unable to live at home. The Service also coordinates foster carers within the Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Services.
biogHist.p: The Kinship and Foster Care team coordinates recruitment, training and education, assessment, and advocacy and support to foster carers within the Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Services, Australian Capital Territory (2005 - )

descriptiveNote.p: The Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service is administered by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Services.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service', in Find & Connect - Australian Capital Territory,

bibref.title: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Kinship and Foster Care Service
